hibernate-mapping.query: select P.id as id, P.code as code, P.dateCreation as dateCreation, P.description as description, P.language as language, P.title as title, COALESCE((select sum(V.value) from Vote V where V.postId = P.id group by V.postId), 0) as voteCount, P.user as user, (select count(1) from Comment C where C.postId = P.id) as numberOfComments from Post P order by P.dateCreation desc
